ItemWeapon.name: crossbow
ItemWeapon.description: A crossbow and matching bolt pouch. It can be recocked with a handle leading to fairly fast rate of fire, for a crossbow anyway. It is however a very unwieldy weapon to use in close quarters. AP 3 4-9 kinetic damage, 3 TU per shot. (A)
